definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

sentences.english: Far from being angry, he is delighted.
sentences.chinese: 他非但沒生氣，反而很高興。

sentences.english: More what to can annoy BE, Chen Shi not only didn't obstruct, but also Kua Qiao Jean is efficient.
sentences.chinese: 更加可氣的是，沈氏非但沒有阻止，還誇巧珍勤快。

sentences.english: The children instead of giving him pennies laughed at him.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們非但沒給他錢，還對他百般嘲笑。

sentences.english: Be more active. Not only will you lose fat, you’ll also be healthier &feel better.
sentences.chinese: 活躍其身，則非但脂之能減，體質與感受皆愈佳也。

sentences.english: The igloos are adorable and incredibly romantic.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的玻璃房非但可愛而且是難以置信的浪漫。

sentences.english: This button almost never helps users, but often hurts them.
sentences.chinese: 這些按鈕非但不能幫助用戶，還可能傷害到他們。

sentences.english: Released and paraded around the capital, she refused to recant. Instead, she repeated her accusations.
sentences.chinese: 她非但不放棄信仰，相反，她不屈從於對她的指控。

sentences.english: On the other hand, conductors often aren't inspiring and just get in the way.
sentences.chinese: 此外，指揮們往往非但不能鼓舞人心，反而礙手礙腳。

sentences.english: Far from relieving my cough, the medicine aggravated it.
sentences.chinese: 藥非但不鎮咳，反而使我咳嗽得更厲害。

sentences.english: To her, the mixture of magical and Muggle blood is not an abomination but something to be encouraged.
sentences.chinese: 在她看來，巫師與麻瓜結婚非但不可惡還應該被鼓勵。

definition: the slightest amount or degree/a bit
unexpectedly/actually/to go so far as to/indeed
conversely/in reverse order/in an opposite direction
one thread, one hair (idiom); a tiny bit/an iota
lit. change to more severe (idiom); to become more intense (esp. of shortcoming)/to aggravate/to intensify
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/in spite of everything/in that crazy way/actually/to go as far as to
